subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Goalie Rick DiPietro sustained a head injury late in the opening period of the Islanders’ 5-3 loss to the host Montreal Canadiens last night. DiPietro was taken to a hospital and released, and Coach Ted Nolan said the team would have no further information until the medical staff reviewed test results.
